Site Map
Dues and Membership
Membership and participation in our Neighborhood Association is on a volunteer basis. All neighbors are highly encouraged to join and participate.
Annual dues are $50. To make payment, please send $50 per household to Patty Madigan along with your Name, Address, Phone Number and Email Address. Please make checks payable to“Oberbeck Neighbors”and mail payment to the following address:
Oberbeck Neighbors c/o Patty Madigan 2616 Heidleburg Lane Charlotte, NC 28210

About Oberbeck Farm Oberbeck Farm is a Crosland Home development built in the late 70's and early 80's. It is a lovely, quiet, wooded neighborhood consisting of 160 homes, all built on cul de sacs. The two entrances to our neighborhood are from Sharon Road West and an indirect entrance from Lytham Road in Brandon Forest.
Neighborhood Handy Man
Cell:(704) 293-2502 Home:(704) 554-8447 juluka@aol.com Click Here for More Info
